name: Let'sWalk
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: let's walk
des:
Are you looking for someone to help you motivate with your daily walk steps? What about letting Alexa to be there with you as you make each step to a better life.

With this new amazing skill called “Let’s Walk”, you can find an inspiration to go out and walk some steps or check how you are doing against Alexa walking steps.

Please note that Alexa will not judge your walking step habits but instead will be there to encourage you each day to walk as often as you can.

All you have to do is to follow the three simple steps below:

• Go out and walk 
• Record your steps as you walk daily
• Check in with this skill to let Alexa know the number of steps you have completed.

You can invoke this skill by saying "Alexa, let’s walk".

Please feel free to check out some other interesting skills listed below to play with friends and family for fun:

• Number Quiz
• Word Check
• Multiply Quiz
• UFC Octagon News
• Let’s Decide

Please feel free to contact us at quizmemore@yahoo.com for any issues or feedback you might have. We would love to hear from you about this skill to help us make this a better experience for everyone.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
